mauna_kea.acknowledgment: The authors wish to recognize and acknowledge the very significant cultural role and reverence that the summit of Mauna Kea has always had within the indigenous Hawaiian community.  We are most fortunate to have the opportunity to conduct observations from this mountain.
mauna_kea.name: All Mauna Kea observatories
